titles.title: Yellowstone Community Education Fairness Act
A bill to ratify and approve certain payments to school districts serving Yellowstone National Park.
Yellowstone Community Education Fairness Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: Yellowstone Community Education Fairness Act - Ratifies and approves all payments made to the school districts serving Yellowstone National Park in Wyoming between the beginning of FY1976 and the enactment of this Act as reimbursement for educational facilities furnished by those districts to certain students who are dependents of persons engaged in the administration, operation, and maintenance of the Park and living at or near it.
